original_text: There were some Philistines and Arabs who lived near people from Ethiopia. The Lord caused them to be angry with Jehoram.
korean_text: 여호와께서 블레셋 사람들과 구스에서 가까운 아라비아 사람들의 마음을 격동시키사 여호람을 치게 하셨으므로

sentences.original_text: There were some Philistines and Arabs
who lived near people from Ethiopia
The Lord caused them to be angry
